{{ picture.id }} {{ picture.alt }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PictureService } from 'src/app/services/picture.service'; import { Picture } from 'src/app/shared/models/Pictures'; @Component({ selector: 'app-picture-page', templateUrl: './picture-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./picture-page.component.css'] }) export class PicturePageComponent implements OnInit { pictures: Picture[] = []; constructor(private pictureService: PictureService) {} ngOnInit() { this.pictureService.findAll().subscribe(data => { this.pictures = data; this.fetchUrlContent(); }); } fetchUrlContent() { this.pictures.forEach(picture => { fetch(picture.url) .then(response => response.text()) .then(data => { console.log(data); }) .catch(error => { console.error(error); }); }); } }
